name: Santa Claus is coming to Bangkok Marriott Marquis Queen's Park
name_original: Santa Claus is coming to Bangkok Marriott Marquis Queen's Park
description:
Game Based for Marketing Campaign of Bangkok Marriott Marquis Queen's Park Hotel Thailand.

Christmas is almost here and it’s even easier to enjoy great gifts! Play our Marquis Santa Claus game, complete 7 missions and WIN special prizes! Visit our hotel bars and restaurants from 5 – 25 December 2019. Watch this video to learn more!

⭐Make sure you don’t miss this fun festive activity! 

📌 If you completed all seven levels and achieved one of the three highest scores, you will be rewarded with a fantastic prize:

1️⃣ Winner ▶️ A one-night stay in an MSuite with MClub access and a 60-minute massage treatment for two people at Quan Spa.

 2️⃣ First runner-up ▶️ Sunday Brunch at Goji Kitchen + Bar for two people. 

3️⃣ Second runner-up ▶️ 60-minute massage treatment for two people at Quan Spa.
